summary: Four vets attending college on the GI Bill and a cabaret singer try to rob a Reno Casino and pull off the perfect crime.
cast: Guy Madison|Kim Novak|Brian Keith|Alvy Moore|Kerwin Mathews|William Conrad|Jack Diamond|Jean Willes|Adelle August|George Brand|Thom Carney|Bill Catching|George Cisar|Eddie Constantine|Chuck Courtney|Frank Gerstle|Kathryn Grant|Tom Greenway|Jo Ann Greer|Geraldine Hall|Mark Hanna|Pete Kellett|John Larch|Jana Mason|Carroll McComas|Don Oreck|Robert Sampson|Hugh Sanders|Robert F. Simon|Marjorie Stapp|John Zaremba
title: 5 Against the House
